title: Announcements
content:
This page contains information regarding upcoming meetings, events, regulations and other useful community information.

The next board meeting is July 16th at 9am Hawaii time. Members are welcome to join all board meetings. The notice with the zoom connection information and agenda can be found here: WKBCA Board Meeting Notice - July 16 2022 9AM

The draft minutes for the prior board meeting can be found here: WKBCA Board Meeting Draft Minutes April 16 2022
